title: The impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on burnout levels among healthcare workers: A comparative analysis of the pandemic period and post-pandemic period
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Andrey Reshetnikov, Olga Abaeva, Nadezhda Prisyazhnaya, Tatyana Romanova, Sergey Romanov, Konstantin Sobolev, Anahit Manukyan
